description: Always at hand and essential in the mountains! Whether alpine climbs on high rock faces, sweat-inducing high alpine tours in summer or demanding ski tours in winter: Ortovox’s first ever underwear-only line, 150 Essential, mirror every movement, provide a good climate and are comfortable to wear. The 150 Essential line features an impressively high proportion of fine merino wool for ideal moisture management and comfort. Tenceltm lyocell fibers ensure the underwear feels lightweight and has a cooling effect during intense activity. Elastane in the material mix guarantees the perfect fit. With a material strength of 150 g/m², the 150 Essential line is also ideal for a broad range of temperatures. A fresh design and colors perfectly round off the look of this durable, long-lasting underwear, making them great mood-boosters. For cool athletes who love experiencing the mountains at any time of year and want underwear that is 100% reliable.
name: Ortovox 150 Essential Boxer Briefs - Mens
